review: I found this book to be somewhat disappointing. The story, while intended to be touching and suitable for young readers, felt a bit flat and lacked the emotional depth and relatable characters I usually enjoy. The pacing was slow, and the plot didn't engage me as much as I had hoped. While the themes of personal growth and love are generally appealing to me, the execution here didn't quite hit the mark. I think the book could have benefited from a more dynamic narrative and stronger character development. Overall, it didn't resonate with me as much as other books in this genre.
